user_query: My company, XYZ Corporation, is considering investing in stocks. Can you fetch the asset allocation details, stock statistic, and dividend and split information for the stock with ticker ID '913255598'? Additionally, provide us with the latest press releases related to this stock for our analysis.

TaskList.description: Fetch the asset allocation details for the stock with ticker ID '913255598'.
Retrieve the stock statistics for the stock with ticker ID '913255598'.
Obtain the dividend and split information for the stock with ticker ID '913255598'.
Fetch the latest press releases related to the stock with ticker ID '913255598'.
